#summary Latest changes to the Dicy
#labels Featured
== Currently working on ==
  * Preventing roll results from being changed by other people.
  * Other systems.
  * Configuration subpanels for other rolling methods.
  * Examples for rolling methods in configuration subpanels.
----
== 30 November 2009 ==
  * Implemented [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fudge_(role-playing_game_system) Fudge].
----
== 18 November 2009 ==
  * Configuration subpanel.
  * Grouping settings for "Sum of all rolls" method.
  * Implemented [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/D20_system D20 System] with character generation.
----
== 16 November 2009 ==
  * Implemented [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/D6_system D6 System]
----
== 10 November 2009 ==
  * Implemented [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nemesis_(role-playing_game) Nemesis] ORE.
  * Implemented [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exalted Exalted].
----
== 08 November 2009 ==
  * Added avatar, home page and description to Dicy profile.
  * Added following limitations on rolls:
    * length of submitted request should not be more than 200 characters,
    * length of generated output should not be more than 200 characters,
    * number of singular die rolls should not be more than 10000 per request.
----
== 04 November 2009 ==
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NWOD New World of Darkness] support. E.g. `[nwod:12]`.
----
== 02 November 2009 ==
  * Now you can write just `[d6+d8]` instead of `[1d6+1d8]` for additive rolls.
